author: travelandtourworld.com
title: The Oman Ministry of Tourism organizes a tourist week in Expo Milan 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
The Oman Ministry of Tourism organizes a tourist week in Expo Milan 2015
Among the activates that are organized for the Expo Milan Exhibition 2015 for the Sultanates pavilion, On Saturday 18th of July, The Ministry of Tourism will launch a tourism week, which will include many events and activates that are aimed at introducing the Sultanate to promote it as a unique tourist destination.
The Sultanate of Oman has chosen the prestigious international showcase of Expo to present the ancient traditions of the country and its future plans for sustainable development. As a strategic meeting point between Asia and Africa, Oman is among the richest countries within its region, when it comes to historical, cultural and environmental backgrounds.
18- 26 July – Tourism Week and National Day, Pavilion of the Sultanate of Oman and in the city.
During the week dedicated to tourism writers, photographers, journalists and important people will be involved in an Omani travel story. Each day will be dedicated to a specific topic, which is linked to the desert, the sea or the traditions. Oman Lounge Pavilion will host the public, the press and operators in a unique way so to create a travel experience in Oman.
The week will culminate with the celebrations for the National Day of July 25. In addition, Oman Air is organizing entertaining events with a group of musicians and coffee servers who will appear around the city center and will interact with the public. Their trip will be filmed and photographed and publicized on digital media.
During the six months of the initiative, the Ministry of Tourism has scheduled a full calendar of events, exhibitions, shows and events to entertain visitors of the pavilion also giving away trips in collaboration with industry partners. The themes will be inspired by the areas of the pavilion, in which visitors can also attend sessions of live cooking and enjoy a wide variety of traditional dishes from everyday dishes o special ones, in an authentic restaurant Omani.
